original_text: Then took I the cup at the Lord's hand, and made all the nations to drink, unto whom the Lord had sent me:
korean_text: 내가 여호와의 손에서 그 잔을 받아서 여호와께서 나를 보내신 바 그 모든 나라로 마시게 하되

sentences.original_text: Then took I the cup at the Lord's hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 주의 손에서 그 잔을 받았고

sentences.original_text: and made all the nations to drink
unto whom the Lord had sent me
